title: Good Four Season Hotel - Ideal for business - Great breakfast
text: Stayed one night at the 4S in Beijing. Modern business hotel with nice, spacious rooms, good service and very good breakfast. I stayed in a king room with separate living room. Hotel design is modern with a contemporary Asian feel in a modern high rise and an internal atrium. Very nice without being spectacular. I booked through Platinum AMEX provided me with a room upgrade (so room category described is at least one up from standard king). Breakfast is buffet style with great selection. I had a breakfast meeting and staff found my a nice private table (but they play music a little too loud for a top business hotel). Had a couple drinks at the bar in the evening and there was a very pleasant atmosphere and a friendly bartender who helped select a couple decent scotches. Room pricing was very reasonable for a hotel of this quality. Would come back for business but not on a family vacation (no wow factor, compared to say the Four Seasons in Istanbul or Paris)
